display_long_description:
Elevate your well-being with our innovative VR Dance Therapy experience. Immerse yourself in breathtaking environments brought to life with tactile visual effects. Each therapeutic movement session is designed and performed by a professional dance therapist.

In this Early Access version, you can explore the essential features of the experience. With your support, we look forward to providing free updates filled with exciting new content in the future!

# Dance therapy
[media]
Experience dance-like sessions recorded by an expert music therapist, where every movement aligns with the rhythm and melody, transforming exercise into an expressive art form.

# Epic music
Immerse yourself in the sweeping grandeur of epic neoclassical music. This genre transcends the boundaries of traditional classical music, blending the elegance of centuries-old compositions with the emotive power of contemporary harmonies. 

# Virtual ASRM
[media]
The experience focuses on a virtual visceral journey through rich visual effects, designed to evoke a pleasant physical sensation on your hands. Select any visual effect to perform any session. 

# Immersive nature
[media]
Wrap yourself in the mesmerising beauty of stunning HD skyboxes, where every glance offers a breathtaking view of the nature. 

# Hand tracking
[media]
Thanks to motion-tracking, your natural gestures are seamlessly translated into digital actions, providing an intuitive and immersive interaction experience. 

Note: This app uses only hand tracking and does not support controllers.
